document_data.name: Drannor
document_data.mainbody: '''Drannor''' was an [[elf]] from [[Cormanthor]] known to be the first to marry a [[dwarf]].
document_data.History: They were considered to be ancient history as of {{yearlink|261}} to the [[Coronal]] [[Eltargrim Irithyl]].
document_data.Legacy: The city of [[Cormanthor (city)|Cormanthor]] was renamed [[Myth Drannor]] in the {{yearlinkName|261}} after the laying of its [[Mythal]], in their honor.
